ResponseRules.description: Sarah Elazar provides all the challenges for progressing through the Cargo Bay.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Waiting on Turrets
ResponseRule.description: Sarah has tasked Morgan with making turrets to defend her men from aliens that will surely flood the compartment and attack them the instant the door is opened. Morgan has gone back to her before completing the job and she reaffirms that the turret task needs to be completed before anything else.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Waiting on Turrets (have plan and power)
ResponseRule.description: Sarah has tasked Morgan with making turrets to defend her men from aliens that will surely flood the compartment and attack them the instant the door is opened. Morgan has gone back to her before completing the job and she reaffirms that the turret task needs to be completed before anything else.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Counting Turrets 1
ResponseRule.description: Sarah has tasked Morgan with making turrets to defend her men from aliens that will surely flood the compartment and attack them the instant the door is opened. Morgan has gone back to her before completing the job and she reaffirms that the turret task needs to be completed before anything else.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Counting Turrets 2
ResponseRule.description: Sarah has tasked Morgan with making turrets to defend her men from aliens that will surely flood the compartment and attack them the instant the door is opened. Morgan has gone back to her before completing the job and she reaffirms that the turret task needs to be completed before anything else.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Admonishes Turret Waster
ResponseRule.description: Sarah tasked Morgan with making turrets to help defend her and her men from aliens int he Cargo Bay. He followed through and made them and placed them in defensive positions, but then inexplicably took them away again. She refuses to open the door and let the battle start until he puts them back.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Gives door code
ResponseRule.description: Defensive turrets are set and ready. Sarah has some trepidation about opening the door that is holding back a swam of aliens, but part of her wants to slaughter aliens as revenge for what happened to the crew. Morgan has done his part in providing her with tuerrets to aid in the battle.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Gives door code (EARLY)
ResponseRule.description: This only plays if the player sets up the turrets early, before ever talking to Sarah. Speedruns and second playthroughs.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Invites Other Survivors
ResponseRule.description: Sarah talks to Morgan before he proceeds deeper intot he alien infested station. She says that they can hold out now with the help from these turrets that Morgan provided, and they offer refuge to any survivors that he might encounter.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Likes Morgan
ResponseRule.description: Sarah has not trusted Morgan for some time, suspecting that he was complicit in shady dealings that could be putting people in grave danger, or worse. But now he has arrived and completed extroidinary accomplishmentsto keep her and her officers alive. Her opinion if him is changing.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Survived Dahl 02 Trap
ResponseRule.description: A sabotuer named Dahl tried to barricade Sarah and her men into Cargo Bay and cut off the oxygen and murder them. Morgan (one way or another) put a stop to Dahl's plan and restored airflow to the Cargo Bay. He has rescued Sarah and her men a second time.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Loiter, Player Opened Door Early
Sarah: Loiter Lines
ResponseRule.description: Batch of lines for when the player is loitering around or clicking on her. Flavor background stuff about the sation and herself, what happened. Variations for different phases: while hunting for turrets, after alien battle, after rescue from Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Loiter Lines (Waiting for Turrets)
ResponseRule.description: Batch of lines for when the player is loitering around or clicking on her. Flavor background stuff about the sation and herself, what happened. Variations for different phases: while hunting for turrets, after alien battle, after rescue from Dahl.

ResponseRule.description: Batch of lines for when the player is loitering around or clicking on her. Flavor background stuff about the sation and herself, what happened. Variations for different phases: while hunting for turrets, after alien battle, after rescue from Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Turret Reminder - No Fabricator or Schematic
ResponseRule.description: The sealed door is all that keeps out a flood of aliens that killed everyone else on the engineering level. Morgan needs to go through, but Sarah will not give him the code unless he provides defensive turrets that she cannot find or build herself.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Greets Player - No Fabricator No Schematic
ResponseRule.description: First greeting of Morgan Karl when he/she arrives in Cargo Bay" This is a simple hello as Morgan approaches the first time. Probably a little icy. She is not a huge fan of the Yu family.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Greets Player - Yes Fabricator Yes Schematic
ResponseRule.description: Morgan has been a badass and done all the stuff he needed to to make turrets, without being told. This impresses Sarah. The sealed door is all that keeps out a flood of aliens that killed everyone else on the engineering level. Morgan needs to go through, but Sarah will not give him the code unless he provides defensive turrets that she cannot find or build herself.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Greets Player - No Fabricator Yes Schematic
ResponseRule.description: Variant: Morgan already founs the Turret schematic, now all he needs is fabricator power. The sealed door is all that keeps out a flood of aliens that killed everyone else on the engineering level. Morgan needs to go through, but Sarah will not give him the code unless he provides defensive turrets that she cannot find or build herself.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Greets Player - Yes Fabricator No Schematic
ResponseRule.description: Variant: Morgan has restored power and the fabricator is active. Now he must fetch the schematic to make turrets. The sealed door is all that keeps out a flood of aliens that killed everyone else on the engineering level. Morgan needs to go through, but Sarah will not give him the code unless he provides defensive turrets that she cannot find or build herself.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Medical Operator - Already Know
ResponseRule.description: Sarah responding to Medical Operator use (likely based on health/Operator trigger).

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: Medical Operator
ResponseRule.description: Sarah responding to Medical Operator use (likely based on health/Operator trigger).

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: PA About Elevators
ResponseRule.description: This is a PA to play before player reaches Cargo Bay. Sara has patched into the PA system.

ResponseRule.name: Sarah: PA About Cargo Bay Explosion
ResponseRule.description: Sarah announces on PA there's been an explosion in Cargo Bay. Intended to let the player know the Cargo Bay is now open.
This only plays if the player sets up the turrets early, before ever talking to Sarah. Speedruns and second playthroughs.
